Name: require_project_status
Description: Ensure project status matches active or completed

Name: require_team_location
Description: Ensure teams are located in allowed regions

Name: require_worker_status
Description: Only active workers are eligible for assignment

Name: require_feature_status
Description: Only features with status 'approved' can be scheduled

Name: require_task_status
Description: Only tasks with status 'todo' or 'in_progress' are considered

Name: require_role_certification
Description: Only certified roles should be assigned

Name: require_user_story_status
Description: Only user stories with 'accepted' or 'ready' status are valid

Name: require_sprint_status
Description: Only sprints with status 'planned' or 'active' are valid

Name: require_blocker_status
Description: Active blockers must be resolved before sprint end

Name: require_velocity_min_value
Description: Ensure minimum velocity threshold is met

Name: require_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Stakeholders must have relevance above low level

Name: require_skill_certified
Description: Only certified skills are considered valid

Name: require_documentation_author
Description: Documentation must have a valid author assigned

Name: require_scumb_board_type
Description: Only digital scrum boards are allowed

Name: require_development_test_status
Description: Only snapshots with 'tested' status are deployable
